sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RENEALMIA , in botany ; a genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the monandria claſs of plants. The corolla is trifid ; the nectarſhm oblong ; the calyx monophyllous ; the anthera ſeffile, oppoſite to the nectarium ; the berry is ſleffiy. There is only one ſpecies, which is a native of Surinam.
